content:
COPY for Collections (cont’d)

  • Depth header of “1”

    • The collection MUST propagate the COPY to all internal, non-collection members.
    • If Overwrite header is “true” the COPY method duplicates all of its external members in a new collections at the Destination
    • If Overwrite is “false” and the destination is a collection, the COPY method does not duplicate external members, but does propagate COPY to all internal non-collection resources.
